description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 3, 5, 6, 7} mod 8.
comments: Numbers n such that A232713(n) is divisible by n. [_Bruno Berselli_, Dec 11 2013]
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,1,-1).
mathematica: Select[Range@ 107, Or[OddQ@ Mod[#, 8], Mod[#, 8] == 6] &] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 23 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
